segments.text: I'm taking a date to a restaurant , so could you please direct me to a good one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But of course ! How much are you thinking of spending on dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She deserves nothing but the best , of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , I would suggest our own hotel restaurant . The chef , the food , and the service are outstanding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I promised her I would take her out to a restaurant . Do you have another one in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can always go to Gramercy Tavern . It's quite popular , despite its expensive entrees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great food and lots of patrons ? What more could I want ? Please reserve a table for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . You're going to have a great time .
segments.speaker: S2
